details: Extracting concepts from the provided text using an LLM.

data.text_input: A quiet hum, a constant warmth. It’s the certainty of a wiggling welcome at the door, a joy that needs no words. It’s a wet nose nudging her hand, a heavy head on her foot, a shared language of simple things. A protective flare when he startles; a deep softness watching him dream. Her world has shrunk to the size of his walks, yet expanded to notice the light on the grass as he does. There are no negotiations, only a quiet vow. It’s checking the sidewalk heat with her hand, knowing the spot behind his ear that makes his leg thump. He is her simplest, furry piece of home.

data.care: Checking the sidewalk heat with her hand, knowing the spot behind his ear that makes his leg thump.
data.attachment: A quiet hum, a constant warmth. It’s the certainty of a wiggling welcome at the door, a joy that needs no words. A wet nose nudging her hand, a heavy head on her foot, a shared language of simple things.
data.kind acts: Checking the sidewalk heat with her hand, knowing the spot behind his ear that makes his leg thump.
data.caring about another person's happiness: Her world has shrunk to the size of his walks, yet expanded to notice the light on the grass as he does.
data.emotion: joy, protection, deep softness, certainty, warmth
